程序包的使用
View

  • 使用View的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    Controller  
    View  
  • Controller使用的View中的类 
    类和说明
    Board_View
    This class creates a panel to play game.
    LoadMap_View
    This class define the GUI for load a game map.
    MenuView
    This class creates a menu panel allows player save game, pause game and quit.
    PlayerCount_View
    This class creates a panel to set the player number.
    PlayerSetting_View
    This class creates a panel to set the player name.
    RiskStart_View
    These classes set up the start GUI of the Risk program.
  • View使用的View中的类 
    类和说明
    Board_View
    This class creates a panel to play game.
    LoadMap_View
    This class define the GUI for load a game map.
    PlayerCount_View
    This class creates a panel to set the player number.
    PlayerSetting_View
    This class creates a panel to set the player name.
    RiskStart_View
    These classes set up the start GUI of the Risk program.
